message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  I think this is a fair split to start.
I'm aiming for a more balanced split, Alice. This considers the time pressure we both face.
I understand the time pressure, Bob, but so far only *my* offers have been fair in terms of the starting split. I've adjusted slightly in your favor, let's close this deal.
Alice, let's be practical. We both lose if this drags on. This is a reasonable edge to me, given the time pressure.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm inching closer to your offer, but I need you to meet me halfway.  We both lose if this keeps up.
